item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Read about Microsoft, Ericsson, Nokia and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Nvidia Probed in China Over Possible Antimonopoly Violations
item.description: Beijing opened the investigation a week after the U.S. placed additional export controls on China’s access to high-end semiconductors.

item.title: Give People What They Really Want: Digital Gifts
item.description: These creative annual subscriptions and unique apps won’t end up in the landfill.

item.title: He Investigates the Internet's Most Vicious Hackers---From a Secret Location
item.description: In the increasingly dangerous world of cybercrime, Brian Krebs faces threats, manipulation and the odd chess challenge.

item.title: The Secret Weapon Helping Businesses Get Results From AI: Humans
item.description: It turns out the latest machines need us as much as we need them.
